Method Detail

listDevices

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,RoomDeviceList> listDevices()
Reads the current device list, validates it by applying some regular expression replaces and extracts RoomDeviceList objects.

Returns:
Map of room names to their included devices.
Throws:
HostConnectionException - if the current FHEM server cannot be contacted
DeviceListParseException - if the read xml content cannot be parsed
java.lang.RuntimeException - if some other exception occurred.
